summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Dept.; and providing for the widening, grading and resurfacing of 9th Ave. from Jefferson St. to Seneca St., Spring St. from 7th Ave. to 9th Ave., and James St. from a point approximately 15 feet northeasterly of 9th Ave. to approximately 15 feet northeasterly of 9th Ave. to approximately 70 feet southwesterly of 9th Ave.; and the construction of concrete sidewalks along said streets where necessary and making appropriations from the City Street Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
